trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Show" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 提供常量以与 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="Show" /> 方法保持兼容。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `Modal` parameter of the `Show` method was used to determine whether a form would be shown as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，`Modal`参数`Show`方法用于确定窗体是否将显示为模式对话框。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the `Modal` parameter is replaced by two different Show methods: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，`Modal`参数替换为两个不同的显示方法：<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>。

trans-unit.source: These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.
trans-unit.target: 这些常数启用已从 Visual Basic 6.0 中继续运行而不进行其他修改升级的代码。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbModal" />.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 Visual Basic 6.0 常量 <see langword="vbModal" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbModeless" />.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 Visual Basic 6.0 常量 <see langword="vbModeless" />。
